question:
Consider the following railway zones with their headquarters:
  1. West Central Railway - Jabalpur
  2. East Coast Railway - Bhubaneswar
  3. Western Railway - Mumbai
  Which of the above is / are correct?
explanation: The East Coast Railway (ECoR) has its headquarters at Bhubaneswar in Odisha. It came into existence on 1 April 2003. The West Central Railway came into existence on 1 April 2003. Its headquarters are located at Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh. The Western Railway headquarters are at Mumbai, Maharashtra.
